relationships.evidence_text: Welcome to the Why On Earth Community Podcast. I'm your host, Aaron William Perry.

You come from Afghanistan.

you are studying the role of charismatic leadership as it relates to despotism, autocracy.

relationships.evidence_text: Yes, I'm a fourth year PhD student here at Trinity College Dublin.

and her masters in international relations from Central European University.
Saraya has several years of experience in communication.
has contributed to different research projects with international organizations as a consultant.

relationships.evidence_text: thank you for the amazing work and research that you're doing
and for uh speaking uh about it in such a cogent and compelling way
and i want to thank you as we wrap up
just want to remind our audience if you haven't yet join the ambassador network and would like to you are invited
if you haven't yet join the ambassador network and would like to you are invited
you can go to yonearth.org and click on the become an ambassador page to get uh that process and your journey started
all kinds of ways to connect to build community to shed light to cultivate a sense of belonging with a whole bunch of us
thank you for the ways you are uh shedding light in our world

i want to just ask you um one last question uh if you could wave your magic wand and describe or prescribe a way in which we humanity could transform our uh our world together over the next several years what would you have us do
to always focus on what we share um what is mutual between us
rather than um noticing differences um and and contributing to more separation
i think what we share with each other each one of us um is so exciting it it's so so rich and it has so much potential um to be explored

on earth dot org backslash support page
